text: Itak, My povedali lyudyam etot rasskaz, chtoby oni znali, chto obeshchannoye Allakhom - [neprelozhnaya] istina i chto [Sudnyy] chas nepremenno nastupit. [Posle ikh smerti] lyudi [veruyushchiye i nevernyye] razoshlis' [vo mneniyakh] otnositel'no ikh [prebyvaniya v peshchere], i skazali [nevernyye]: "Vozdvignite nad nimi stroyeniye.
